title: New York City Comptroller to suggest Russian assets for divestment
description: New York City Comptroller Brad Lander on Sunday said he plans to specify Russian assets for pension boards to "consider for divestment" in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
content: New York City Comptroller Brad Lander speaks during a "Defend Democracy" rally, taking place on the first anniversary of the January 6, 2021 attack on the U.S. Capitol, in Brooklyn, New York, U.S., Jâ€¦ [+742 chars]
